subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
Please accept my apology for not contacting you earlier before now due
to my tight schedules. I did not forgot your past effort and attempts
to assist me,now I'm happy to inform you that I have succeeded in
getting those Funds transferred Under the co-operation of a new
partner from Japan.
Meanwhile, I did not forget your past efforts and attempts to assist
me in that Process despite that it failed us at that time, due to no
trust. Now,I want you To contact my secretary, his name is Mr. Tom
Bello and his email address is ( 
tombellochi@gmail.com
 ) (
tombellochi@gmail.com
 ), Arrange with him on how the total sum of two
MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS ($2,000,000,00USD) will reach you safely
which I have Already kept for your compensation for all the past
efforts and attempts to Assist me in this matter. I appreciated your
efforts at that time very much.Please send the below information to
him to enable him get back to you immediately Please, accept this
token of appreciation and God blessed you.
Below is the contact details of My Secretary Mr. Tom Bello
Name: Mr.Tommy Bello
Email: 
tombellochi@gmail.com
Tel:: +234-2089619672
  Dont Forget to send your following Information to Him
(1) FULL NAMES AND YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS..
(2)YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS...
(3)PHONE NUMBER.....
(4) YOUR OCCUPATION AND YOUR AGE....
Regards From.
Barrister Datti Williams (esq. Jr)

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Barrister Datti Williams esq. Jr,

I'm delighted to hear from you and I'm glad that you've successfully secured the funds with your new partner from Japan. It's always a pleasure to be of assistance, even if things didn't work out as planned initially.

It's very generous of you to remember my efforts and offer such a significant token of appreciation. However, I must clarify that I am not comfortable sharing my personal details over email for security reasons.

Could you please provide more information about this process? How will the funds reach me safely? Is there any other way we can proceed without me having to share my personal details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: Dear Friend Received your compensation of $2,000,000
body:
*Dear TinaThis is to acknowledge the Email you sent to me I was instructed
My boss (BARRISTER DATTI WILLIAMS)  before he traveled concerning Your
International Certified Bank Draft of  ( US$2,000.000usd ) (TWO MILLION
UNITED STATE DOLLARS) he left for you in form of INTERNATIONALCERTIFIED
BANK DRAFT. I am Mr. Tom Bello the secretary to the Barrister.Meanwhile, I
want you to choose the way you want your INTERNATIONAL BANK DRAFT to reach
you. This is the only three ways the BANK DRAFT can get to you. You will
have to choose from the listed express below and get back to me as soon as
possible so that I will send you the Information to send the shipping fee
of any one you choose through Western Union Money Transfer or Money Gram.1,
Through FedEx Service=shipping fee $1002, Through DHL delivery
service.=shipping fee $2003, Through ATM CARD, Shipping fee $5004. Bank to
Bank transfer cost Fee $1,200please writes me back and let me know the
express you will want me to Use in shipping the bank draft to your
residence.You have to do this fast for you to get your bank draft delivered
to your house address immediately within 48 hours as soon as this mail gets
to you. Below is my Identity CardNote:I understand what you are saying, but
you have to send your personal information where these bank draft will be
deliverYOUR FULL NAME.............YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER......YOUR DELIVER
ADDRESS.........I  am assuring you that  your personal information is safe
Call me for more details +234-8089619672I will be expecting your callMr.
Tom Bello*

subject: GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
Re: GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details?

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
*Dear Tina  Thanks for Your mail , Yes i have a Great Day, And i hope you
too have a Great Day, For Us not to Waste much Of Our Time, In my Previous
email sent to you, I told you to Forward some of your Vital Informations,So
that an Attorney will assist you Obtained Legal Document like Certificate
Of Ownership of the Fund From Finance  Ministry.  And i assured you that
your information is well secure and safe You are to send the Following
Details *

YOUR FULL NAME...........

YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS...............

YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER FOR EASY COMMUNICATIONS............





*With these Informations, The attorney will obtain the legal Documents and
a Copy shall sent to you as the Original Owner of the FundLooking forward
to Hear From youThanksMr Tom Bello *

subject: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
*Dear Tina  Thanks for Your mail , Yes i have a Great Day, And i hope you
too have a Great Day, For Us not to Waste much Of Our Time, In my Previous
email sent to you, I told you to Forward some of your Vital Informations,So

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
Hello Tom Bello,

Thank you for your prompt response. I hope you're having a wonderful day too! 

I appreciate your assurance about the safety and security of my funds. However, I'm a bit confused about the process. Could you please explain more about this legal document from the Finance Ministry? What exactly is it and why is it necessary?

Also, could you tell me more about this attorney who will assist me? How long has he been practicing law and what's his area of expertise?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
*Dear Tina,  Gland to have your Reply , This Legal Document is a Document
From Finance Ministry, Is  called Certificate Of ownership, This Document
will back you Up as the Original beneficiary  owner of the $2,000,000.00.*






*When this Fund hits your Bank account Or Deliver to you, You will have
Nothing to Fear, Because you have already Obtained the Certificate of the
ownership of the Fund.So therefore you have Nothing to Fear about.The Name
Of the Attorney , Who will help You secure the Certificate is Barrister
Chinos Ben, He has practiced Law for past 20years, You have nothing to
worry, He will assist you secure the Certificate and send you a Copy Of it
as the Beneficiary of the Fund.I am looking forward to Receive your
Personal Information , To enable him Proceed FurtherMr Tom Bello*

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
Hello Tom Bello,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's really interesting to hear about this legal document from the Finance Ministry. I'm not very familiar with these things, so it's great to learn something new.

You mentioned that this document will back me up as the original owner of the fund. That sounds quite important! Could you please explain a bit more about how that works? 

Also, you mentioned Barrister Chinos Ben who will help secure the document. He seems like a very experienced person in his field. Could you tell me more about his work and how he will assist in securing the document?

I'm looking forward to hearing more about this process and understanding it better.

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
*Dear Tina  The Document will stand to you as the beneficiary of the
Fund,You know when such Huge amount of money Hit your bank account in your
Country, The banks Or the Government will  like to know  your source  of
getting such money, In that process you have to show them the Document as
the Original Beneficiary of the Fund.As soon as you send your Informations,
The Barrister will Go and submit it to the Finance Ministry, and they will
issue him the Document, The barrister will Sign the Document and a Copy
will send to you , before the release of the Fund to you I hope i have made
myself ClearMr Tom Bello*

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
Hello Tom Bello,

Thank you for your prompt response. I hope you're having a wonderful day too! 

I appreciate your assurance about the safety and security of my funds. However, I'm a bit confused about the process. Could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? What exactly is this legal document from the Finance Ministry? And how does an attorney assist in obtaining it?

Also, could you tell me more about this attorney? How long have they been practicing law and what's their area of expertise?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
Hello Tom Bello,

Thank you for your email and I hope you're having a great day too! I appreciate your assurance about the safety and security of my funds. 

However, before we proceed, could you please explain to me in more detail about this legal document? What exactly is it and why is it necessary? Also, could you tell me more about this attorney who will assist me? It would be great if I could know their credentials or experience.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
Hello Tom Bello,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, this is all quite new to me and I'm trying my best to understand it all. 

So, if I understood correctly, the document will serve as proof of the source of the funds when they hit my bank account? And this document needs to be signed by a barrister and submitted to the Finance Ministry before the funds can be released?

Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? Also, what role does the Finance Ministry play in all of this?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Tina

subject: Re: URGENT WAITING GET BACK TO ME FROM MR TOM BELLO
body:
*Dear Tina,   Yes, The Document will serve as proof of the  source of the
funds when it  hits  your bank account.And it must be signed by the
barrister. before the Fund will be released. The Finance Ministry plays a
Role as the Nigeria Government that approved the fund on your behalf as the
beneficiary of the Fund., They play a Role as your witness. Tina time is
going On, please send  your personal information to enable proceed Further,
stop wasting much time againMr Tom Bello*
